name: MLBFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: With the MLB Flash Briefing, you’ll get daily updates from Major League Baseball. We’ll deliver updates on the latest news, transactions, injury reports, scores and other related information from around the league. It’s everything about MLB that you need to know.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
